text: 150px Union Sportive Roye-Noyon Coeur de Picardie (former Union Sportive Royenne) is a French association football club founded in 1928. It is based in Roye, Somme, France and plays in Regional 1 Hauts-de-France, the sixth tier in the French football league system. They play at the Stade André Coël in Roye.
